item.title: Pinjun Zheng
item.description: About Me I am a Ph.D. student at King Abdullah University of Science and Technology (KAUST), majoring in Electrical and Computer Engineering (ECE). I currently work in the Information Science Lab (ISL), under the supervision of Prof. Tareq Al-Naffouri. Before that, I got my Bachelor and Master degrees both from Harbin Institute of Technology (HIT). My research interests are radio localization and phase retrieval problem. Education Profile Ph.D student, Electrical and Computer Engineering, KAUST, KSA, 2021-present.
